body_html: The implementation of both scan and map_fn uses TensorArray. Nesting scan inside map_fn is essentially nested while loops. Unfortunately, there is a known bug when TensorArray and nested while loops are used together. We have been working on a fix.
body_text: The implementation of both scan and map_fn uses TensorArray. Nesting scan inside map_fn is essentially nested while loops. Unfortunately, there is a known bug when TensorArray and nested while loops are used together.  We have been working on a fix.
body: The implementation of both scan and map_fn uses TensorArray. Nesting scan inside map_fn is essentially nested while loops. Unfortunately, there is a known bug when TensorArray and nested while loops are used together.  We have been working on a fix.
